text: In a sea of rich fabrics and decadent jewels, Kendall Jenner stood out on the Met Gala red carpet in a simple, breezy white jumpsuit. The airy look was by Off - White, and the model fittingly brought designer Virgil Abloh as her date to the fashionable fÃªte. Her gauzy ensemble didn't quite fit with the theme for the evening ( ` ` Heavenly Bodies : Fashion and the Catholic Imagination'' ), but it did turn heads for a surprising reason : it's seriously reminiscent of the look Kim Kardashian wore to last year's event. Both sisters rocked dreamy, cream off - the - shoulder ensembles and had their hair parted right down the middle : Getty Images Kim's dress last year, courtesy
